Articles.Content:
Just look at that maniacal laughter while doing insane things, she has the same screws loose as jeb it seems, it only ever seems to be Jeb and Val that like the things i build. what is it that gives kerbals the insanity trait that makes them fearless anywho? 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/y01p8K76XlY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-20T15:09:49Z" title="05/20/2015 03:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 20, 2015</time> by Roflcopterkklol**

BadS = true

Only Jeb and Val have it, afaik

> 
> BadS = true
> Only Jeb and Val have it, afaik

No, other Kerbals will randomly get that flag as well.

> 
> No, I am not. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

\*slow claps\*

Gg, kid. Gg. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> No, other Kerbals will randomly get that flag as well.

Yeah every now and again you find one thats like jeb but its rare, only one i can remember is Munly kermin from my 0.90 game

It's about 10% of the Kerbals that are badS. 

In one save I have 23, and 3 of them are BadS.

In another save, I have 202 Kerbals, and 18 are BadS.
